Manufacturer of electronic devices (iPhone, iPad, MacBook) and software.
MSFT - Microsoft Corporation: Software company (Windows, Office, Azure) and hardware (Surface, Xbox).
GOOGL - Alphabet Inc. (Google): Search engine, advertising, cloud computing, and hardware.
E-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.
Electric vehicle manufacturer and clean energy company.
Social media company (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Oculus).
NVDA - NVIDIA Corporation: Graphics processing units (GPUs) for gaming, professional visualization, and artificial intelligence.
Streaming service for movies and TV shows.
Semiconductor company for CPUs and GPUs.
SPY - SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust: Tracks the S&P 500 index of large-cap U.S. stocks.
